input_email_body:
Subject: Guidelines for Securing Medical Data in IT Systems

Are guidelines available to provide security measures for medical data in healthcare IT environments? It is crucial to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of sensitive patient data You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. I would appreciate recommendations on security practices to protect against cyberattacks and data breaches. Thank you for your time and assistance with this matter. I look forward to hearing back soon. My name is John Doe.
